1425140.name: Until Last Breath
1425140.description:
I making the game on my own (Mario Murkl) :

The Until Last Breath is a survival action game with multiple guns and character.

The game is use the Unreal Engine 5

I work alone, the whole map is set in the forest , and an abandoned military outpost.
The game is cost me lot of Energy and Work , i would like to sell it for really competitive price.

The game is running on Windows 10 64bit, there is no Linux support at all, it could change this in the future.

Story
In your dream suddenly you find yourself in a forest, with zombie hordes and they are coming in waves.

Inspired from Killing Floor, but only on 1 map, which will be reworked a few times when the seasons are comes up.

If you have any question , feel free to ask.

The music under the Trailer / Game brought The HangmanJack Band.

Regards
Mario Murkl
1425140.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
